title: Person In Lotus Position Dark Skin Tone
description: A person in the lotus position, a common meditation pose, with dark skin tone. It signifies peace, mindfulness, yoga, and spiritual practice.
apple_vendor_description: The person in lotus position emoji on Apple devices, depicted with a dark skin tone, sits in a state of peaceful contemplation, with smooth, rounded limbs and a serene facial expression. Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle shading enhance the sense of calm and inner focus. This emoji symbolizes meditation, mindfulness, tranquility, and spiritual practice, conveying a feeling of deep relaxation and well-being on Apple devices.
